v11","id":"dc4aa619-1bb3-426f-b1a3-b3017b8192e5","active":false},{"type":"flatten","opts":{"key":"parsed","regex":"^.+$","keyReplacement":"%1","keepOrig":false},"comment":"","id":"75f3e442-a251-490d-80be-d3a95a82763e","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the value is empty
        if v == '' then
            -- delete the key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end






"},"comment":"remove all keys that have empty values","id":"fe010bc5-0459-4b7b-966e-a6696172bd76","active":true},{"type":"block_keys","opts":{"regex":"month|day|HTTP|log|csv|time|FUTURE_USE","matchCase":false,"regexEngine":"pcre2","nestedPath":""},"comment":"remove original event and wrapper","id":"daf7b885-10f8-41e9-b137-2b2c2e8d8dbb","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    -- check if both fields exist
    if record['Source_Zone'] ~= nil and record['Destination_Zone'] ~= nil then
        -- concatenate the fields
        record['checkDuplicate'] = record['Source_Zone'] .. record['Destination_Zone']
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"concatenate the Source_Zone field and the Destination_Zone field into a new field checkDuplicate","id":"29b8c72d-76ad-4453-a1b2-7d1453801db2","active":false},{"type":"block_records","opts":{"key":"checkDuplicate","regex":"INTERNET-IINTERNET-O","matchCase":true,"regexEngine":"pcre2"},"comment":"block I - O","id":"f6b22468-2c33-4342-9c7e-75e7fdff1e0d","active":false},{"type":"block_records","opts":{"key":"checkDuplicate","regex":"INTERNET-OINTERNET-I","matchCase":true,"regexEngine":"pcre2"},"comment":"block O - I","id":"659f74e2-a1d7-4127-9035-233aca253026","active":false},{"type":"delete","opts":{"key":"checkDuplicate"},"comment":"","id":"7bb92adc-820e-4465-8e05-1e7356d0a301","active":false},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the key contains "source"
        if string.match(k, "source") ~= nil then
            -- rename the key
            record[k:gsub("source", "src")] = v
            -- delete the old key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"Rename fields that contain "source" to "src"","id":"c1f967d7-21ff-4d09-96cb-597a9fe839c0","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the key contains "destination"
        if string.match(k, "destination") ~= nil then
            -- rename the key
            record[k:gsub("destination", "dst")] = v
            -- delete the old key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"Rename fields that contain "destination" to "dst"","id":"0d8d37d6-b0b9-4bfe-a2cd-b086fa1a2ad4","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the key contains "Source"
        if string.match(k, "packets") ~= nil then
            -- rename the key
            record[k:gsub("packets", "pkts")] = v
            -- delete the old key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"Rename fields that contain "packets" to "pkts"","id":"68ec09a7-6a5b-46a8-a8e9-52a036e66ed6","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the key contains "Source"
        if string.match(k, "application") ~= nil then
            -- rename the key
            record[k:gsub("application", "app")] = v
            -- delete the old key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"Rename fields that contain "application" to "app"","id":"df8b305a-1a73-4406-9d8f-03e89313032a","active":true},{"type":"block_keys","opts":{"regex":"src_country|dst_country|action_flags|rule_uuid","matchCase":false,"regexEngine":"pcre2","nestedPath":""},"comment":"","id":"61a72d39-f5d4-4cb7-97f7-412bd4379eb7","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the value is "0"
        if v == "0" then
            -- delete the field
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"if field value is "0" then remove the field","id":"2908b07f-c20e-4853-bf2d-bfd675c45a75","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    -- check if Tunnel_Type is equal to "N/A"
    if record['tunnel_type'] == 'N/A' then
        -- delete Tunnel_Type
        record['tunnel_type'] = nil
        -- delete Tunnel_ID
        record['tunnel_id'] = nil
        -- delete Tunneled_app
        record['tunneled_app'] = nil
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"if Tunnel_Type has the value "N/A" then delete Tunnel_Type and Tunnel_ID fields","id":"5318c192-b44f-402d-ada1-c4d52b558353","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    -- check if app_Subcategory is equal to app_Category
    if record['app_subcategory'] == record['app_category'] then
        -- delete app_Subcategory
        record['app_subcategory'] = nil
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"if app_Subcategory is equal to app_Category then delete app_Subcategory","id":"848effb9-958b-4879-bd04-745ee0e53e00","active":true}]]====================])
